item.description:
Hello, come join us for an easy and fun late morning canoeing outing.

We will meet there promptly at 10:45 am and rent the boats (either canoe or kayak).
Let's try to be on the waters by 11:00 before it gets too hot.

Pricing and information can be found here:

http://www.outdoorrec...

I believe you can bring some light snacks on board but wouldn't recommend much more.

We can go get lunch afterwards in Malden or Medford.

I plan on cutting off the RSVP on Thursday, August 6 so that I can confirm reservations with the boat managers.

I will forward a number after the cutoff date. I will monitor the weather and if necessary adjust the date if it looks like it will rain.

thanks and I look forward to seeing you there.
item.how_to_find_us: meet at picnic table. look for Meetup sign
item.name: Spot Pond - Canoeing / Kayaking / Paddle Boats
